sentences.en: He comes from Leeds or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他是利兹或其附近的人。

sentences.en: He comes from Ohio or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他出身于俄亥俄州或那附近.

sentences.en: He lives in London or thereabouts.
He told us that her age was forty-eight or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我们她的年龄在48岁上下。

sentences.en: He wondered how the territory thereabouts was growing.
sentences.cn: 他想看看那一带地区发展得怎么样了.

sentences.en: He's moved to Chicago or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他已迁往芝加哥或其附近.

sentences.en: I shall await you at seven - thirty or thereabouts.
I'll be home at 8 o'clock or thereabouts.
I'll see you at 9 a.m. or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 我在九点或大约九点时见你.

sentences.en: Only when it finds nothing wrong thereabouts does it feel at ease.
sentences.cn: 随后,它知道没什么异常,安心了.

sentences.en: She was a servant - maid at 3 pounds a year wages, or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 她是个每年只挣三个金镑左右的女仆.

sentences.en: The factory is in Leeds or somewhere thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 那工厂在利兹,也许在利兹附近.

sentences.en: These houses were built in 1930 or thereabouts .
sentences.cn: 这些房子是1930年左右建造的。

sentences.en: They just laughed and told him he would find no fortune thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 人们只是笑笑,跟他说这一带没钱可挣,发不了财.

sentences.en: Victory Mansions were old flats , built in 1930 or thereabouts, and were falling to pieces.
sentences.cn: 胜利大厦还是一九三○年左右盖的,已经太老啦, 简直就坍成个瓦砾堆.

sentences.en: We'll see you at 9 or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 我们九点左右与你们见面.

words.tran_cn: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

trans.tran_cn: （地点、时间、数量等）大约，上下，附近，左右
trans.tran_en: near a particular time, place, number etc, but not exactly
